snippet: Jordany Valdespin, the Mets rookie utility player, became angry when he returned to his locker to find the shirt he had worn to the ballpark torn and written upon.
abstract: Jordany Valdespin, the Mets rookie utility player, became angry when he returned to his locker to find the shirt he had worn to the ballpark torn and written upon.

headline.main: In Mets Clubhouse, Tension Over Valdespin's T-Shirt
